WorkItem.Description:
Hi, since the last release i get this message when i try to "Show pending updates". Only on Windows XP.
Firewalss on the remotemachines are off by GPO. With Windows 7 no problems.
WorkItem.Summary: COM Exeption. Verify the firewall settings on the remote machine

Comments.Message:
I don't have this behavior. You say "since the last release", can you try with the previous release.
Check that nothing have change in your GPO.
